subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Posted just a few new FB#12 files some interesting sweep rate answers

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

It doesn't seem to me that you are disagreeing with each other!

Robin


  =
----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Frank Ratka<mailto:warrior18eii@yahoo=
.com> 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
  Sen=
t: Friday, January 25, 2008 7:05 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Posted jus=
t a few new FB#12 files some interesting sweep rate answers



  You can di=
sagree, I will let'cha! LOL I think this is a misunderstanding between us o=
nce again. The whole point of the communication is to bring about the spiri=
tual evolution of mankind. To convince not us but others that their is an e=
xistence greater than the small petty worlds we have created around ourselv=
es. They mean to increase our humanity, tolerance to change, and unconditio=
nal love for one another so that we can join that existence with comfort. T=
he very same communications you are getting from Mike and Lisa, you are get=
ting by way of influence through your spiritual connection to them and many=
 others who remain silent.

  It is our job to spread the word to as many t=
hat will listen of what we have learned. Not to just sit in our extra bedro=
oms, garages, attics or whatever and test different combinations of radios =
and misc circuitry. The positive messages are what is important not the equ=
ipment. We need to change people's attitudes.

  Regards,

  Frank R.


  -=
---- Original Message ----
  From: bruce halliday <paranormalinvestigating@=
hotmail.com>
  To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Friday, January 25, 2008=
 8:43:08 AM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Posted just a few new FB#12 files =
some interesting sweep rate answers


  Frank,
   
  I have to disagree.
  =
I believe they have a purpose for putting so much effort into relating this=
 communication in the hopes
  that we will strive to better the communicati=
on so as to get better and clearer messages that convey their precise inten=
tion.
   
  Mike and Lisa have told me how difficult it is to transmit this=
 communication and they have a sense of urgency in their messages
  trying =
to make us sit up and take notice. 
   
  I would hate to believe they do n=
ot care about the outcome of man kind and ignore our problems, no matter ho=
w petty they may seem
  to a higher being. there has to be a method and an =
end to their means. I don't think they are participating in this miraculous=
 communication for entertainment.
   
  If I am misunderstanding your meani=
ng, which has happened to us in the past. Please let me know.
   
  Bruce

=



  Bruce Halliday 






    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
    From: warri=
or18eii@ yahoo.com<http://yahoo.com/>
    Date: Fri, 25 Jan 2008 06:28:17 -=
0800
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Posted just a few new FB#12 files some =
interesting sweep rate answers


    Bruce,

    The powers that be on the =
other side can't even begin to relate to human rationality or our petty per=
spectives. The beings I am talking about know exactly what we are conversin=
g about at the moment it is typed on the screen. With one thought of them t=
hey are aware of your presence. Them seeing us in not an issue...lol. We ha=
ve their attention but for the most part they don't have ours (as in the hu=
man race).

    Regards,

    Frank R.


    ----- Original Message ----
  =
  From: bruce halliday <paranormalinvestiga ting@hotmail. com>
    To: evp-=
itc@yahoogroups .com
    Sent: Thursday, January 24, 2008 6:09:22 PM
    Su=
bject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Posted just a few new FB#12 files some interesting=
 sweep rate answers


    LC,
     
    I believe that is what our spirit f=
riends are striving for,
    to let mankind know there is something bigger =
than ourselves.
     
    Maybe if the powers that be could hear that with =
their own ears from the other
    side they may stop and take a breath of r=
ationality.
     
    As for the catalyst I think that is what we are meant=
 to be!
     
    Bruce





    Bruce Halliday 






      To: EVP-ITC@ya=
hoogroups .com
      From: lcdupla@yahoo. com
      Date: Thu, 24 Jan 2008 =
23:54:12 +0000

      Bruce,

      It's going to =
take a major change for harmony, peace and elevated 
      mindset to occur=
 in mankind...major perspective change for sure. 
      That will demand so=
me catalyst to unite- transform minds IMHO.

      LC

      global tensions

      someone decides to tu=
rn left instead of right.
      > 
      > That's my take on these type of =

      every couple of sessions.
      > 
=
      > Bruce

      wondering about this time=

      similar statements of urgenc=
y over my RS box set-up, too. Any more 
      ideas regarding this, Bruce..=
.FS.. .others? I personally believe time 
      to be illusion, and I also =
